myNotebook.name: MyNotebook
myNotebook.description: Your notebook to save your Notes,Todos and Email Reminders in the cloud! MyNotebook, your go-to platform for streamlined note-taking, task management, and future planning. Powered by the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) stack, our small but mighty project is designed to simplify your daily life by providing a seamless and efficient way to organize your thoughts, tasks, and reminders.

My Portfolio.name: My Portfolio
My Portfolio.description: This is my personal portfolio website. It is a simple, clean, and responsive website that showcases my projects, skills,education,experience and contact information. The website is hosted on Netlify.

DOST Web.name: DOST Web
DOST Web.description: DOST - Your Virtual Assistant Companion! Your reliable virtual assistant designed to simplify your daily tasks and enhance your productivity on the Windows platform. (Windows App currently in development)

Library Management System.name: Library Management System
Library Management System.description: This is a simple console-based Library Management System implemented in the C programming language. The program allows users to perform various library-related tasks, such as borrowing books, returning books, adding books to the inventory, deleting books, and displaying the available books.

TextUtils.name: TextUtils
TextUtils.description: TextUtils gives you a way to analyze your text quickly and efficiently. Be it word count , character count etc.TextUtils is a free character counter tool that provides instan character count and statistics for a a given text. TextUtils reports the number of words and characters. Thus it is suitable for writing text with word/character limit.

NewsMonkey.name: NewsMonkey - News App
NewsMonkey.description: NewsMonkey is a news app that provides the latest news from around the world. The app is powered by the NewsAPI, which allows users to search for news articles by keyword, category, or source. Users can read news according to their preferences and stay updated with the latest happenings.

Hospital Management System.name: Hospital Management System
Hospital Management System.description: Health Wings Hospital Management System (Class 12 Project) is a GUI-based application developed in Python using TkInter for the interface, Pandas for data manipulation, and CSV for data storage. The system is designed to streamline the process of bed booking and patient record management in a hospital setting.

Task Master.name: Task Master - Flask App
Task Master.description: Task Master is a simple task management app built using the Flask web framework. The app allows users to create, update, and delete tasks.

Pig Game.name: Pig Game
Pig Game.description: Pig Game is a simple dice game that can be played by two players. The game is played with a single six-sided die. The objective of the game is to be the first player to reach a total score of 100 or more points. Players take turns rolling the die and accumulating points.The player can choose to 'Hold', which means that his ROUND score gets added to his GLOBAL score. After that, it's the next player's turn. However, if a player rolls a 1, they lose all their points for that turn and the next player takes their turn.

Guess My Number.name: Guess My Number
Guess My Number.description: Guess My Number is a simple number guessing game where the player has to guess a number between 1 and 20. The player has a total of 20 attempts to guess the correct number. After each guess, the game provides feedback to the player, indicating whether the correct number is higher or lower than the guess. The game also keeps track of the player's high score, which is the lowest number of attempts taken to guess the correct number.

college.name: Bengal College of Engineering & Technology
college.description: Bengal College of Engineering & Technology (BCET) is a private engineering college located in Durgapur, West Bengal. The college is affiliated with the Maulana Abul Kalam Azad University of Technology (MAKAUT) and offers a variety of undergraduate and postgraduate programs in engineering and technology.
college.period: 2022 - 2026 | Pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering

school.name: Maharishi Vidya Mandir Senior Secondary School, Silpukhuri,Guwahati
school.description: Maharishi Vidya Mandir (MVM) School, Guwahati is a part of Maharishi Global Education Movement. The school is affiliated to Central Board of Secondary Education, New Delhi up to Senior Secondary level.

1.tittle: 2nd in CODE OF DUTY and 3rd in CODE ERROR
1.description: I secured 2nd podition in CODE OF DUTY and 3rd position in CODE ERROR of the event CYBERVERSE 2024 organised by Cybercell Club of BCET.

2.description: At Code Vision, Bengal College of Engineering & Technology (BCET), Durgapur, I serve as a Coordinator. My role involves organizing a variety of coding events, workshops, and seminars to foster a strong coding environment among the student body.

3.description: I joined the National Service Scheme (NSS) at Bengal College of Engineering & Technology (BCET), Durgapur, in September 2023. I am actively involved in various social service activities .

4.tittle: Swachh Bharat Ekk kadam swachhta ki oar event by NSS BCET
4.description: I participated in the Swachh Bharat Ekk kadam swachhta ki oar event organised by the NSS BCET. The event was aimed at promoting cleanliness and hygiene in the local community.

5.description: I volunteered in FIESTA 2K23 organised by the Enterpreneurship Development Cell(EDC) of BCET. The event was aimed at promoting innovation and entrepreneurship among students.

6.description: Our team (Edgerunners) secured 2nd place in the CODEJAM HACKATHON  organised by the CODE VISON Club of BCET.

7.description: I am currently working as a Coordinater at Entrepreneurship Development Cell, Bengal College of Engineering & Technology (BCET), Durgapur. I take part in organizing various events, workshops, and seminars to promote entrepreneurship and innovation among students.
